title: Developer luxury housing accelerates school gentrification
description: Developer luxury housing accelerates school gentrification
content:
Scenario: Developer luxury housing accelerates school gentrification
    Given a developer builds high-end housing in gentrifying neighborhood
    And displacement impacts working-class families
    When the Observer analyzes school enrollment changes
    Then analysis shows: low-income student enrollment dropped 40%
    And school demographics shifted from 70% to 35% students of color
    And affordable family housing converted to luxury units
    And development accelerated displacement affecting educational equity
    And gentrification impacts on schools become visible and challengeable
